website_summaries.verdict: If a current, reasonably accurate map is what you need, this reference version by a top name in world geography is a good choice.
pros: An excellent choice for students and classrooms, thanks to the mid-range size, price, and high degree of accuracy
Laminated paper has a durable feel
Nice coloration makes country identification easy
cons: A few complaints from consumers who received maps with bends, creases
The scale sizes of some countries are a bit off

customer_reviews.title: 10 countries visited, 185 to go!
customer_reviews.text: This map is fantastic! It brightens up my office space and a great way to contemplate ideas ..travel ones especially! The paper is thick and glossy. I do have a lot of sunshine coming into the room and the paper has not been affected by it at all. You will need a second person to help you put it up because it's rather large and bulky. It took me several tries to get it up just right. Lovely isn't it? (check out my pic)
customer_reviews.author: Anisa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful map!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful map, came rolled in perfect condition. color are vibrant and text is clear. Was looking for a more accurate map than the mercator spread and this does a decent job. the lamination makes it wipable with a whiteboard marker, or stickers, which i decided to go for as I didn't want to stab this beautiful piece with tacks. The border makes it feel very finished and wall ready. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: K Austin

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Write on This Map!
customer_reviews.text: The map is a bit smaller than I'd expected, but the bigger disappointment came when the children wrote on the laminated surface with a blue erasable marker. It wouldn't erase! They had used a black erasable marker previously, so I don't know what caused the problem - only that we now need to find a new map.
customer_reviews.author: book-kritik

customer_reviews.title: Amazed how current it is (2016)
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this map in July of 2016 and assumed based on the low cost that it would be a little out of date. Was shocked to find the copyright on the map we received is from 2016, the current year! It includes South Sudan and has Crimea shaded in grey to show it's contested/annexed. The map is laminated and seems very high quality. Very impressed and pleased with this wall map!
customer_reviews.author: Bowkerhouse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Got my kids to "wow" when they ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Got my kids to "wow" when they first saw it on the wall. We talked about the world, other countries, places. Travel times, roads, sea passages, mountains, etc. Since the map is high detail and well laminated, you can write on it with erasable markers. Great for finding vacation spots and marking it with the date when the family plans to go there. Kids love this. Plus this map make the room look more interesting and decorated. Good product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. NC

customer_reviews.title: I love the art and detail of this world map
customer_reviews.text: I love the art and detail of this world map. It's nice to look at and useful for my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: aella8

customer_reviews.title: Great map, great projection
customer_reviews.text: It's surprisingly hard to find a good wall map that doesn't use the Mercator projection. The Winkel Tripel projection used in this map is much more realistic than Mercator, and doesn't make Greenland look the same size as Africa. It seems to be made of good quality laminated material, is very up to date, and looks great on my wall!
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband - he wants to start a pin map to mark where we've travelled. It is a really nicely laminated map. I like it a lot and am looking forward to affixing it to cork board and putting it up when we move.
customer_reviews.author: Kari D

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous map
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my sister's birthday, and it's one of the most beautiful maps I've ever seen. I love maps, I have hundreds, and I've drawn hundreds more. This is just plain gorgeous. it's quite hard to describe why. When I opened it up to take a peep before I handed it over to my sister, I coveted it. Not wanted, coveted. Lusted for it. I haven't got another one yet, because I have so many, but one on the wall just got accidentally torn on the edge, so I may need a new one that won't tear so easily, since it could be laminated...
customer_reviews.author: James A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I always recommend this map
customer_reviews.text: This map has been on my wall for about 3 years now and still looks great. It is behind the couch where little fingers and toes poke and kick and it has held up really well. The colors are lovely and we use it almost every day. Texts are easy to read and the details are greats.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Very professional apearance and current.
customer_reviews.text: My map arrived in perfect condition, I like the professional look and the colors. The black border adds to the classy look. My son is in the Military and his job takes him all over Europe and more, so this way I can accurately follow him while talking to him rather than having to talk and to look the locations up on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good definition. I have it in my study
customer_reviews.text: Good definition. I have it in my study. Not enough open wall to put a big map up. This one is easy to read, nice coloration for identifying countries, laminate makes it easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Nice map. Laminated
customer_reviews.text: Nice map. Laminated. It was a bit wrinkled out of the box, but overall good condition. One suggestion is thinking about mounting option before buying. I had to purchase the 3M command strip for a seamless option.
customer_reviews.author: Adam617

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, not gaudy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year, and it did NOT have gaudy colors. Very professional looking, but not dull. I have it in one of my pediatric patient rooms, and it has held up fine. I knocked down a star because when I received it, the thin laminate was partially curled off at the top. I thought it would quickly unravel but it has not. I will buy another this year for my four year old's room. I searched a lot of maps, and despite the reviews from 2010 regarding gaudy colors, this is the best map for the price!
customer_reviews.author: hanalola

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! I have the same map since 2003 and wanted a newer published version and I was not disappointed. I have people stopping by my office to look at my beautiful map and dream about where they would like to go next. After all it's a small world:-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to real country sizes
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding map, grandson was shocked to see the variance in sizes from this map to Rand and other maps. Excellent tool for kids learning about the world.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen  H.

customer_reviews.title: I Love this map!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT MAP!! I've wanted a world map forever and this one was inexpensive and perfect. LOVE that it is laminated. My only complaint would be that the laminated plastic seems to loosen when pinned so must re-pin now and again because the map gets loose on the wall, but for $20 who cares!
customer_reviews.author: chuck auge

customer_reviews.title: this map is perfect. It's nicely laminated
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a large world map that we could display on a wall and tag all the places we've visited and want to visit. I didn't actually think I'd find one big enough for a reasonable price. However, this map is perfect. It's nicely laminated, colorful, and easy to read. Kids have no problem locating things. Perfect find!
customer_reviews.author: ShanC

customer_reviews.title: Recommend - beautiful and clear
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this. I have both the world and US maps. I like they are laminated, and the black border. These re functional and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Best

customer_reviews.title: NICE LARGE WORLD PERSPECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered (2) so as to get the free shipping and it's a great map, nicely laminated, and looks good in my office without further framing. We put the other one in our Shipping area so our people have a better idea of world geography when we are sending our products offshore. The gloss mat material is reflective and therefore it shows wrinkles and edge marks a little more than I would have liked. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Scalewoodman

customer_reviews.title: The map arrived in perfect condition. I have always wanted a wall map ...
customer_reviews.text: The map arrived in perfect condition. I have always wanted a wall map of the world. This one is surprisingly vibrant in color; I cannot seem to stop staring at it. It is also a perfect size for my home office (approx. 2'6" x 4'0"). The map came rolled up and placed into a plastic sleeve for added protection during shipment. Nicely done.
customer_reviews.author: Gxser

customer_reviews.title: easy to read and large without being overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: This map is EXACTLY what we were looking for. It is bright, easy to read and large without being overwhelming. Seeing it everyday is inspiring our desire to travel more and more!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Homeschool Wall
customer_reviews.text: We love this laminated map for our homeschool. It is large enough to be useful and has enough detail to get a good idea of where things are (example: major cities). The lamination is heavy enough to keep it secure and even move it from place to place (or reposition it, as I had to do a couple times since I was hanging it on my own) without tearing or wrinkling. I'm very happy to be able to recommend this to other homeschoolers or families who want a good wall map in their home.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for Christmas, he loves it! Doesn’t really have anything hanging in his room so this was a nice touch and he actually does use it every so often!
customer_reviews.author: sasha Visti

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Travel Momento
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful map, perfect to adorn my bedroom wall and mark the countries that I have traveled to. The lamination keeps the colors vibrant and easy to dust.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful laminated poster
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful laminated poster. Got it for our son for Christmas; arrived just in time! He was so happy with it that he ended up using some of his Christmas cash to purchase another map from Europe. Excellent buy that looks great in his bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Olga B.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for the map
customer_reviews.text: thank you for the map it looks nice on my wall. I like looking at where all the countries are located.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Maria Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive. Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive map. Looks classy with black boarder even though its just a laminated poster. Happy with purchase. Accurate.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Nice map
customer_reviews.text: Bought this map for homes schooling. Great map, we use it all the time, easy to read, nice and big.
customer_reviews.author: vickie s.

customer_reviews.title: A lot bigger than expected which was a good thing. My 7 year old and I travel ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger than expected which was a good thing. My 7 year old and I travel at lot and it's great to be able to have a map like this at home that we can look at and reference whenever he wants to.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle N.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! They need to use this map in schools!
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Up to date and nice-looking
customer_reviews.text: This is a detailed but beautiful political map of the world. It's quite large and takes some time to flatten.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Madon

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous use of colors!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what the title says. It's a laminated wall map. On top of that, it adds to my shack with the gorgeous use of colors. I have a ham radio license. Therefore, I bought this map, some cork board, and some map pins to mark the countries off as I contact them from my shortwave radio. It makes for a great discussion point when people enter my "shack" (ham radio speak for the room with the radio equipment).
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R.

customer_reviews.title: looks good on the wall and durable
customer_reviews.text: It looks great on my wall. Laminated so its durable,
customer_reviews.author: qwerty

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding map with pops of colour and the black border makes it look classier. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amron1966

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this one... looks great ..nice details.. and all the country colors are well in contrast
customer_reviews.author: Reddy

customer_reviews.title: sharp looking and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Great map. We use it for kids room. Looks sharp and is very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: A Scheifele

customer_reviews.title: You will be impressed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors. Clear graphics. Larger size makes the map easy to read. I had it mounted on foam core at a local framer for $35, and it looks stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Cesca Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Love this map!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this map to track my travel history and wish-list of places to visit, but now that I've seen it, it's too pretty to stick pins into, so I'll have to use those pointy sticky arrows or something. The map is very colorful and fairly detailed. I would definitely recommend this map!
customer_reviews.author: BookLover

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Good map. I put it on some press board so the pins wouldn't go into my wall. I knew it wasn't a thick map when I bought it. Definitely a clear and good looking map. No issues with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Addiego

customer_reviews.title: Great Map
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice colored , size map for the price. It being NG , you knows it is of good quality. I looked at quite a few maps..color , size , price and this is it. Also it is laminated , that's a big plus !
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap lamination
customer_reviews.text: Colors were great. Useable with whiteboard markers. Too glossy due to poor lamination. Pay a little bit more and get a lot more. MB
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Laminated
customer_reviews.text: I hung this in my Sunday School room. I teach middle school and high school students. It was the right size, laminated, so that it will stay clean. Easy to read & colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Carr

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with the laminated map
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with the laminated map. I was so anxious to get it on my wall that I forgoed having it framed and slapped it in the wall with 4 thumbtacks. Definitely worth the price and it's truly a great looking map.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and pleasant to look at.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wall map I found. Some comments from other reviewers are very helpful. So thank you! The map has a lots of details and the letters are clear. The colors of this map give an artistic touch. I think the laminated map is ONLY available from Amazon Prime, not from the other companies selling on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Li from New York City

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful world map, vivid colors
customer_reviews.text: The map is really good, with many details and very bright colors. There are all the majour rivers and mountains, the oceanic ridges and interesting addition, lists of country by size and population. The surface of the states and the mountain heights are in feet, which is not great for Europeans. Latitude and longitude plus time zones indicators complete the map. The lamination is not the best I have ever seen, but it is good enough to protect the map from dirt and liquid spills. The map is meant to be put on a wall, so make sure you have space enough in your place. Overall a pleasant purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Francesco

customer_reviews.title: A giant great map !
customer_reviews.text: This is a great map, huge so you can read it. I purchased one previously on The National Geographuc web site and paid more. It is easy to read because the colors were carefully chosen. I have it on my kitchen wall and refer to it constantly when I read about a place in the world. I also use it for travel planning.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Mc Nellis

customer_reviews.title: Nice World Map
customer_reviews.text: I had this map framed and it looks great on my wall.
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE W

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect addition to my office room
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect addition to my office room. Looks really pretty. I am more knowledgeable about the countries, cities and capitals then ever before.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Thin and Strong Material. Well Print
customer_reviews.text: Very light that I stapled on the wall without hesitation of damaging the wall. Well colored print. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Balue

customer_reviews.title: Too much glare!
customer_reviews.text: This is a colorful map, but the glare is not good. It makes it difficult to see the pins we have in different countries. A matte finish would be better if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Clover Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors. Looks great behind my desk. Hung with Command poster strips. Thanks to whoever suggested that.
customer_reviews.author: gczaban

customer_reviews.title: high quality world map
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful map with thick lamination. Securely packaged in its own tube in a box. Shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: fussybudget

customer_reviews.title: Great map
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. She put it on the wall above her bed and is able to reference it and simply enjoy it. Honestly I am surprised that it looks this nice for the price. It's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: World Map
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking map. Had it custom'ed framed and matted to match our living room décor and it turned out nice. We purchased the traditional size (from Amazon) – arrived rolled up in a tube and was laminated.
customer_reviews.author: KLRay

customer_reviews.title: It is great. Even matches the wall color
customer_reviews.text: I have already learned lots by just having it up on the wall for reference. It is great. Even matches the wall color. Reading is more interesting if I can go to a map to find out where in the world the story takes place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful map
customer_reviews.text: Realized the schools are literally failing our children when it comes to geography. This hangs between their rooms now and we constantly refer to it when discussing news or events. Great quality, great clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: ... rejected because I commented exclusively on the fact that like many customers I received a very badly damaged product
customer_reviews.text: My original review of this product was rejected because I commented exclusively on the fact that like many customers I received a very badly damaged product. I am fascinated that Amazon does not think this issue is important or relevant enough to post here. That said, I better get reviewing... or this post will be rejected as well. Had the product not been virtually destroyed in the packing/shipping process, I suspect it to would have been a nice map. The laminate was of a lighter weight than I expected but beneath the creases and wrinkles the product seemed to resemble what was advertised here.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Collier

customer_reviews.title: A must for people interested in world history!
customer_reviews.text: I am a voracious reader of several subjects: holocaust-shipwrecks-pirates-autobios. This beautiful wall map lets me actually SEE where things are happening (in the book), and it makes reading so much more enjoyable! :)
customer_reviews.author: robbied14

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have the world on their wall!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter helped me hang it on my wall and we have been planning trips and memorizing country names for weeks. Good to have and better than a boring photograph. It's educational and interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Meyers

customer_reviews.title: The colors are vivid and the map is easily read. Being laminated is a real plus
customer_reviews.text: The map was just what I wanted. The colors are vivid and the map is easily read. Being laminated is a real plus. I have it over my kitchen sink so I can travel as I do my dishes. I would recommend this map.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the lamination makes it sturdy. It looks like it will last for years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for his college apartment. He likes the visual aid to use in the political science courses he's taking. It's a great-looking map, up-to-date, and the lamination makes it sturdy. It looks like it will last for years. An excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: koregon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was fine, but not what I was looking for so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lizotte

customer_reviews.title: So much info
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best world maps I have. It includes all kinds of things from topography to territorial claims, to submerged continents, latitude/longitude and I can't remember what else. It is hung in my classroom and we use it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Ertel

customer_reviews.title: Really nice map
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this plastic coated map on foam core and have it hanging in the hallway in my Bed and Breakfast. I put pins in the home location of each of my guests! Everyone loves to linger in the hallway and see where our guests have come from.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaPurple

customer_reviews.title: This map is so cool. Love how the colors of each country poppes ...
customer_reviews.text: This map is so cool. Love how the colors of each country poppes out, Perfect in size and worth the tiny extra amount for getting it in the tube! Made the room of our Youth Group so welcoming and it looks so professional.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred

customer_reviews.title: Too Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Utterly gorgeous map! Like beautiful colors and geography? If so, this big beauty is sure to please you. I absolutely love it. It's hung up on my living room wall with simple mounting tape. God bless! God said, Believe on the Lord Jesus Christ and you will be saved - Acts 16:31.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This map is being used in my high school classroom. It is large enough for students in the rear to make out geographical features, but not most countries and no cities at all. Even, so it meets my needs for a non-digital reference perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H

customer_reviews.title: could be allot better
customer_reviews.text: I am giving 1 tar because part of the laminate was separated from the edge of the map when it arrived. I bought this to hang over my red leather sofa where I previously had a metal multi picture that kept falling off the wall that I ordered from somewhere else. Needless to say I needed something big and inexpensive to hide the damage done from the other work. I do plan on framing this piece but now will have to put a Matt around it and go with a bigger frame. For now we stapled it to the wall above the sofa..looks tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Wolftears

customer_reviews.title: Lovely map
customer_reviews.text: We use the map to play I Spy so that our son (and I) can learn about which cities are in which countries.
customer_reviews.author: TarTags

customer_reviews.title: Great map!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boyfriend. He loves maps and this is a good one. It's large, detailed, and labeled very thoroughly. One day we spent over an hour looking at it on the floor because it's so cool! I think it would be very nice framed.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: National Geographic World Decorator Map
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are spending our retirement years traveling the world. This map is perfect for documenting where we have been and picking where we will go next. The map is quite large.
customer_reviews.author: Donanjo

customer_reviews.title: You will enjoy this.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter aND have caught myself staring at it several times. It is very detailed and gives lots of information. It is great for any child or adult. I could spend hours checking it out. It really is the best flat map I've ever seen. It was packaged well and arrived in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: BradW

customer_reviews.title: Great map
customer_reviews.text: Great map and labeling. Perfect for my kids to explore! I love that Greenland isn't distorted. It's so hard to explain to a 6 year old! LOL
customer_reviews.author: A. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful map
customer_reviews.text: This map is really beautiful. It is 73"x48". It came rolled up in a plastic tube.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie's Kindle Addiction

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality laminated map, easily mounted with a mounting tape (not included).
customer_reviews.author: rkruger

customer_reviews.title: Great map!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great map and it's laminated and was shipped to us rolled up in a long box. I was worried it would be folded and ruined by the time it got here but it was perfect. Very eye-catching map.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He travels all over and this helps him keep track of where he has visited
customer_reviews.author: D. Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great map
customer_reviews.text: Great map of the world. We hung this in our home office and I use it every time I hear of a country in the news and I'm not sure its location. Pretty also!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Top quality product
customer_reviews.text: This map is excellent! Well worth every penny and very good quality print. Top quality lamination.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: The map is great, it's laminated, so easy to post on walls with a simple tape. Plus the colour code used is amazing and gives a historic feel to look at it. I purchased this map to have a general sense of the geographic locations of countries and this map is perfect for that. Plus point, it also has a small list of largest countries (by area and by population with actual numbers), which is something good to know.
customer_reviews.author: Juggs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the map and is perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Whitco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Ordered this for our son. Hangs above his desk. Love that it comes laminated!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good size, and the quality of the material is ...
customer_reviews.text: Good size, and the quality of the material is nice. It reflects modern developments well (e.g. the Aral Sea is shown contracted), but some of the marks are left unexplained. For example, there is no key explaining what the dotted areas in Australia represent. Also, the map really highlights capital cities over others, even when other cities might be larger or more important (e.g. Canada). Those were interesting editorial decisions, but overall I liked this.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lidster

customer_reviews.title: This map is worthy of National Geographic!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful map and I have it hanging right next to my desk. I can take a quick look to locate anywhere in the world, sort of like, the world is at my fingertips with this map!
customer_reviews.author: R Tattersfield

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this map. The lamination is a huge plus I didn’t know I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Puneet

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous map, even includes the time zones. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous map, even includes the time zones. I hung it in my cubicle so that I could see what countries my customers were traveling to. Hard for management to complain about this!
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: World Map
customer_reviews.text: Maps is made of tough Tyvek like material, colorful, and in better perspective/scale than maps we've had in the past, and not US centric!
customer_reviews.author: J. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my classroom
customer_reviews.text: A great map and I love the colors. Serves my purposes well. As the world keeps changing, I would recommend searching for the very latest edition before you commit to getting this one.
customer_reviews.author: Xen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in my office. The colors are great and the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful map!
customer_reviews.text: Map is colorful and easy to read, font size isn’t too small.
customer_reviews.author: LilyPad5

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my classroom
customer_reviews.text: This map was a nice addition to my classroom. It is laminated, but not that nice, thick lamination that you get from your school laminator. Be sure to hang this one at eye level, as the print can be very small.
customer_reviews.author: Sary G

customer_reviews.title: It's great for the eyes to wander when taking a break
customer_reviews.text: This hangs on the wall in my home office. It's great for the eyes to wander when taking a break.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful map
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous map in multi-colours and with added insert views. We mounted it and hung it on our wall and it looks highly professional. It serves as a great reference for all of our trip planning, friend following, and curiosities.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sumtin

customer_reviews.title: Where in the World?!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice map - Wish I had got the laminated one, but still very happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Stormie

customer_reviews.title: Works for me...
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband and he loves it. Roll and store by his chair and desk, so he can keep up with the worlds news
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTALLITE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good-looking map that looks fantastic in our home office against chartreuse paint! The lamination is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great looking...makes the living come alive...really glad I bought it....make sure you order the laminated one..
customer_reviews.author: david sher

customer_reviews.title: For the Boys' Room
customer_reviews.text: This map is wonderful. Each night the kids (4 & 2) try to locate a new place on the map. It's a terrific learning tool. I'm so glad we purchased this. Now I just need a map of the solar system....
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good map
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and great detail but ripped in the corners from the tacs. Even though it's laminated you just be very careful
customer_reviews.author: Alex  Review Enthusiast

product_meta.title: National Geographic: World Decorator Wall Map - Laminated (46 x 30.5 inches) (National Geographic Reference Map)
